org.jppf.management.diagnostics

Class ThreadDump

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.management.diagnostics.ThreadDump
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ThreadDump
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class encapsulates a JVM thread dump, including dealocks information when available.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadDump(ThreadMXBean threadMXBean)
      Create this thread dump from the specified thread mxbean.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadDump

        public ThreadDump(ThreadMXBean threadMXBean)
        Create this thread dump from the specified thread mxbean.
        Parameters:
        threadMXBean - the thread MXBean to get the information from.

    • Method Detail

      • getThreads

        public Map<Long,ThreadInformation> getThreads()
        Get information on the threads.
        Returns:
        a mapping of ThreadInformation objects to their thread id, or null if no thread information is available.

      • getDeadlockedThreads

        public long[] getDeadlockedThreads()
        Get the ids of the deadlock threads, if any.
        Returns:
        the ids as an array of long values, or null if none exists.

        Overrides:
